description.value: The Melfesh Monster sprays flaming gas in a @Template[cone|distance:15] or a @Template[line|distance:30]. Creatures in the area take @Damage[4d6[fire]|options:area-damage] damage (@Check[reflex|dc:21|basic|name:Flame Lash|options:area-effect] save). This ability replaces the firelance ranged Strike.
